name: The Neon God We Made
description: A cityscape of Ortigas CBD from the iconic EDSA Shrine vantage point. This scene shows a juxtaposition of religious iconography against hallmarks of hypercapitalism and megacorporatism. I took over 20 photos of this scene and chose the best possible combination of LED billboards for the most powerful storytelling. By Lucius Felimus: https://www.luciusfelimus.com/
